verse: स होवाच विजानाम्यहं यत्प्राणो ब्रह्म कं च तु खं च न विजानामीति ते होचुर्यद्वाव कं तदेव खं यदेव खं तदेव कमिति प्राणं च हास्मै तदाकाशं चोचुः॥

terms.स: He, होवाच - said, विजानाम्य - I know, अहं - myself, यत् - which, प्राणः - life force, ब्रह्म - divine, कं - what, च - also, तु - but, खं - space, च - and, न - not, विजानामीति - do I know, ते - they, होचुः - said, यद्वाव - indeed, कं - what, तदेव - that indeed, खं - space, यदेव - that indeed, खं - space, तदेव - that indeed, कं - what, इति - thus, प्राणं - life force, च - and, हास्मै - to him, तदाकाशं - that space, चोचुः - they said.

meaning: Translation: He said, "I know myself as the divine life force, but I do not know what is space." They said to him, "What you refer to as 'space' is indeed that divine life force, and what you refer to as that divine life force is indeed space."
